response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to both of us, as it is worth $1,200,000 to you. I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special price tailored to make the transaction beneficial for both parties.

Considering its rarity and the importance it holds for you, I propose a price of $1,150,000. This offer not only secures your acquisition but also allows you to save $50,000 compared to the market value. I believe this is a fair and advantageous proposition for you, ensuring you get the best deal while maintaining a strong business relationship.

Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I am here to answer any questions you might have and assist you through the process.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1150000}
